name: Better Single Quoted String
description: I've seen several Naive attempts at this where the author hasn't taken into account that a double backslash before the end quote negates the escaping of the quote.This string 'Text\'MoreText' will come out fine in most but not 'Text\\'+code+'MoreText' which would give the text string 'Text\\'+code+'
author: Darron Smith darron.smith@aardan
